scripts.setup: cd mito-ai && (test -d venv || python3 -m venv venv) && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -e ".[test]" && touch yarn.lock && jlpm install && jlpm build && jupyter labextension develop . --overwrite && jupyter server extension enable --py mito_ai
scripts.run: cd mito-ai && source venv/bin/activate && jlpm build && jupyter lab --browser=chrome
